document_data.name: Sornafein Melarn
document_data.mainbody: '''Sornafein Melarn''' was the house patron of [[House Melarn (Menzoberranzan)|House Melarn]] in [[1479 DR]].
document_data.Personality: The [[drow]] was intelligent and handsome, with great charm. He enjoyed his current situation.
document_data.Abilities: Melarn had a beautiful voice and was skilled with a number of stringed instruments.
document_data.History: Sornafein was a musician in his early life until a performance circa [[1390 DR]] when he met [[Zhindia Melarn]], who fell in love with him at first sight. He soon became the first house patron of the new House Melarn. His ability to mitigate the matron mother's fury made him the most popular male of the house.
